thread.title: Effingham high school students design playgrounds
thread.title_full: Effingham high school students design playgrounds | savannahnow.com

author: G.G. Rigsby
title: Effingham high school students design playgrounds
text:
Photos High school students from Effingham present playground projects to the Board of Education. (G.G. Rigsby/Effingham Now). By G.G. Rigsby Third-year Early Childhood Education students from South Effingham High School and Effingham County High School presented their Pre-K playground projects to the Board of Education on Oct. 7.
The projects were part of a unit on child-directed play. The students were given budgets, playground specifications for safety and building codes and were tasked with designing a playground that would accommodate all kinds of students.
The students had to draw their playgrounds to scale and show how much of their budgeted money they spent. The teachers are Bonnie Pritcher at ECHS and Julie Beasley at SEHS.
